import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem} from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) // calculate prices cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log("order") } return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X {item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
